name: dotbox-button
description: The button component provides stylish buttons with various options including variants, sizes, and icons.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Button variant (primary, success, danger, info, default)

properties.name: animated
properties.description: Whether the icon should be animated

properties.name: href
properties.description: If provided, renders as an anchor tag

events.name: click
events.description: Dispatched when the button is clicked

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<dotbox-button variant="primary">Primary Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="success">Success Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="danger">Danger Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="info">Info Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="default">Default Button</dotbox-button>

examples.title: Button Sizes
examples.code:
<dotbox-button variant="primary" size="small">Small Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="primary">Default Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="primary" size="large">Large Button</dotbox-button>

examples.title: Animated Icons
examples.code:
<dotbox-button variant="primary" icon="fa-spinner" animated>Loading</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="info" icon="fa-cog" animated animationType="pulse">Processing</dotbox-button>

examples.title: Disabled Buttons
examples.code:
<dotbox-button variant="primary" disabled>Disabled Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="success" icon="fa-check" disabled>Disabled with Icon</dotbox-button>

examples.title: Link Buttons
examples.code:
<dotbox-button variant="primary" href="#">Link Button</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="info" href="#" icon="fa-info-circle">More Info</dotbox-button>
